Articles.Content: i really want to use this, but my laptop cant handle the volumetric clouds, even on th 64 bit. any tips?

Not sure if anyone else has this problem, but my Kerbin clouds in map view seem to be doubled. Like there are two layers, slightly apart from each other.

There's probably another Cloudlayers.cfg in your Clouds folder. It's located in the BoulderCo folder.

i really want to use this, but my laptop cant handle the volumetric clouds, even on th 64 bit. any tips?

In the EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements folder, there's a settings config. Open that up and you can change how many are rendered at once and in how big of an area.
k thanks ( i have to write 10 characters)
wait, i have volumeHexRadius = 12000 and volumeSegmentDiv = 3, which is which? and what should i do?

There's probably another Cloudlayers.cfg in your Clouds folder. It's located in the BoulderCo folder.

There was one in there for Astronomer's Visual Pack as well. Pulled that out and it seemed to work ok.

wait, i have volumeHexRadius = 12000 and volumeSegmentDiv = 3, which is which? and what should i do?

I can't remember exactly. From rough and probably incorrect memory, Volumehex radius is the radius of a hexagon. The higher you put it, the more area the hexagon covers. This will not even the cloud spread though, and you'll get very spread apart clouds. Volumesegment is how you change that i believe. Just play around with the settings and see what happens. I'm not a credible source of info on that config.
Thesonicgalaxy, do you plan any near future updates that I should wait on? Or should I just re-install since my .24 wipe?

Thesonicgalaxy, do you plan any near future updates that I should wait on? Or should I just re-install since my .24 wipe?

No, I haven't really done anything since release. Just go ahead and re install V5.

during start up, when i come at the main menu module maanger warns me about incopatable real solar system , i only have its dll not the mod, i have recorded no visible impact in pleminarry testing to games visuels, ba v5 stil works as it was with 23.5, either false positive?

Real solar system's AFG modifier is a part of RSS that still works. Sadly alot of other stuff seems to be broken or act very strangely.

Real solar system's AFG modifier is a part of RSS that still works. Sadly alot of other stuff seems to be broken or act very strangely.

what kind of other stuff? first testing revealed no problem with new update for me and i use a heck ton of mods

So, the only thing about BA that I don't have running on 0.24 x64 are the sun flares. The sharedassets10 thingy is the 32 bit one, and I have absolutely no clue how to mod the 64 bit one (There is a KSP_Data and a KSP_x64_Data folder now), or if it would even work the same way. If anyone has the time and knowledge to make a the 64 bit sharedassets file happen, I'd greatly appreciate it.

So, the only thing about BA that I don't have running on 0.24 x64 are the sun flares. The sharedassets10 thingy is the 32 bit one, and I have absolutely no clue how to mod the 64 bit one (There is a KSP_Data and a KSP_x64_Data folder now), or if it would even work the same way. If anyone has the time and knowledge to make a the 64 bit sharedassets file happen, I'd greatly appreciate it.
